assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was approved by Hospital Erasto Gaertner’s Institutional Review under number CAAE: 65971917.0.0000.0098. A waiver of informed consent was approved due to the retrospective nature of the study and the use of de-identified data only. The study was conducted in accordance with the principles set out in the Declaration of Helsinki.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.
